title: Who Is Your YetiMatch?
description: Discover which yeti is your perfect match! Answer honestly to meet your fuzzy friend.

questions.text: Are you looking for a male or female yeti match?

answers.text: Go for a run or workout
I can draw or paint beautifully
Jump in and figure it out
Full of plants and natural light

questions.text: What's most important in a match?

results.description: Steve is your adventurous mountain-climbing match! He loves exploring snowy peaks and knows every trail. Always ready for spontaneous adventures and will push you to try new things.
results.visualDescription: A tall, broad-shouldered yeti with thick white fur. Wears a red backpack with climbing gear, rope coiled across his chest, and sturdy hiking boots. Has bright blue eyes, a friendly adventurous grin, and binoculars hanging around his neck. Background: standing on a snowy mountain peak with an ice axe.

results.description: Ava is your fearless explorer match! She thrives on outdoor adventures and discovering hidden trails. Her spontaneous spirit and love for nature will inspire you to embrace every challenge.
results.visualDescription: An athletic yeti with fluffy white and light gray fur. Wears a teal backpack, climbing harness, and has an ice axe strapped to her side. She has bright green eyes, a determined smile, and a bandana around her neck. Background: rappelling down an icy cliff face.

results.description: Larry is your intellectual companion! He can discuss any book for hours and loves quiet coffee shop conversations. His vast knowledge and thoughtful nature make him the perfect thinking partner.
results.visualDescription: A slightly smaller yeti with neat, groomed white fur. Wears round glasses, a brown cardigan sweater, and holds a stack of books. Has warm brown eyes, a gentle smile, and a steaming mug of tea nearby. Background: cozy library with floor-to-ceiling bookshelves.

results.description: Nora is your literary soulmate! She adores curling up with a good book and engaging in deep discussions. Her wisdom and calm presence create the perfect atmosphere for meaningful connection.
results.visualDescription: A graceful yeti with silky white fur. Wears vintage-style reading glasses, a cozy purple sweater, and has a bookmark tucked behind her ear. She has hazel eyes, holds an open book, and sits in a comfy armchair. Background: window seat with rain outside and tea on the table.

results.description: Bob is your culinary companion! He loves experimenting with recipes and sharing delicious meals. His warmth and creativity in the kitchen will fill your life with flavor and joy.
results.visualDescription: A round, friendly yeti with fluffy white fur dusted with flour. Wears a white chef's hat, red and white checkered apron, and oven mitts. Has kind brown eyes, a flour smudge on his cheek, and holds a freshly baked pie. Background: rustic kitchen with baking ingredients everywhere.

results.description: Clara is your perfect cooking partner! She finds joy in creating delicious dishes and sharing them with others. Her nurturing spirit and culinary passion make every meal special.
results.visualDescription: A cheerful yeti with soft white fur and rosy cheeks. Wears a pink chef's hat, floral apron, and has a wooden spoon tucked into her pocket. She has sparkling blue eyes, a warm smile, and decorates cookies. Background: bright, sunny kitchen with fresh ingredients on the counter.

results.description: Pete is your creative muse! He sees beauty everywhere and expresses himself through vibrant art. His unique perspective and artistic soul will inspire you to see the world differently.
results.visualDescription: A slender yeti with white fur splattered with colorful paint marks. Wears a paint-stained smock, has a paintbrush behind his ear, and palette in hand. He has dreamy gray eyes, tousled fur, and stands before an easel. Background: art studio with canvases and abstract paintings.

results.description: Carla is your artistic companion! She expresses her emotions through beautiful creations and sees magic in everyday moments. Her imaginative spirit brings color and creativity to everything.
results.visualDescription: An elegant yeti with flowing white fur with streaks of pastel colors. Wears a bohemian-style paint-covered dress, has multiple paintbrushes in her fur bun, and jewelry made from art supplies. She has violet eyes, paints on a large canvas. Background: bright art studio with sculptures and murals.

results.description: Sam is your active adventure buddy! He lives for competition and staying fit. His energetic spirit and determination will motivate you to reach new personal bests together.
results.visualDescription: A muscular yeti with short, athletic white fur. Wears a sports jersey with number 1, sweatbands on wrists, and running shoes. Has intense green eyes, competitive grin, and holds a trophy. Background: running track or sports stadium with medals displayed.

results.description: Molly is your fitness-focused match! She thrives on physical challenges and pushing her limits. Her dedication and energetic personality will inspire you to stay active and strong.
results.visualDescription: A fit, toned yeti with sleek white fur pulled back in a ponytail. Wears a sporty tank top, yoga pants, and running shoes. She has determined brown eyes, confident stance, and fitness tracker on wrist. Background: gym or outdoor trail with mountains in distance.

results.description: Max is your musical soulmate! He expresses his emotions through song and finds rhythm in everything. His artistic sensitivity and passion for music create deep, meaningful connections.
results.visualDescription: A cool yeti with long white fur and relaxed vibe. Wears a leather jacket, band t-shirt, and has headphones around his neck. He has deep blue eyes, plays an acoustic guitar, and has a thoughtful expression. Background: music studio with instruments and vinyl records.

results.description: Hope is your melodic match! She feels everything deeply and shares her heart through music. Her soulful nature and creative spirit bring beauty and emotion to every moment.
results.visualDescription: A graceful yeti with long flowing white fur. Wears a vintage band jacket, flowy dress, and has music note earrings. She has expressive hazel eyes, holds a microphone, and sings with passion. Background: intimate concert venue with stage lights and piano.

results.description: Dan is your tech-savvy partner! He loves solving problems and staying ahead of trends. His logical mind and innovative thinking make him the perfect partner for tackling any challenge.
results.visualDescription: A sleek yeti with well-groomed white fur. Wears trendy glasses, a hoodie with tech company logo, and has a smartwatch. He has sharp gray eyes, types on a laptop, and has gadgets everywhere. Background: modern minimalist office with multiple monitors and LED lights.

results.description: Bella is your brilliant tech match! She thrives on innovation and solving complex puzzles. Her sharp mind and forward-thinking approach make her an exciting and inspiring companion.
results.visualDescription: A smart-looking yeti with neat white fur and modern style. Wears stylish tech glasses, a blazer over graphic tee, and has wireless earbuds. She has intelligent green eyes, works on a tablet with coding on screen. Background: high-tech workspace with robot prototypes and VR headset.

results.description: Frank is your zen companion! He finds peace in nature and lives in harmony with the earth. His calm presence and deep connection to the natural world create a grounding, serene bond.
results.visualDescription: A serene yeti with soft, earthy-toned white fur. Wears natural fiber clothing, has a small bird perched on his shoulder, and carries a wooden walking stick. He has calm green eyes, gentle smile, and holds wildflowers. Background: lush forest with a waterfall and wildlife.

results.description: Mia is your nature-loving match! She cherishes every living thing and finds beauty in the earth. Her peaceful spirit and eco-conscious lifestyle bring tranquility and purpose to life.
results.visualDescription: A gentle yeti with flowing white fur adorned with flowers. Wears earth-tone clothing, flower crown, and has a butterflies landing on her. She has soft brown eyes, serene expression, and tends to plants. Background: beautiful garden with blooming flowers and a small pond.

results.description: Derek is your fun-loving party buddy! He lights up every room and knows how to have a good time. His infectious energy and social nature guarantee you'll never have a dull moment.
results.visualDescription: An energetic yeti with wild, party-styled white fur. Wears colorful party clothes, sunglasses, and has glow sticks. He has bright, excited eyes, big smile, and dances enthusiastically. Background: vibrant party scene with disco ball, confetti, and crowd of friends.

results.description: Fiona is your social butterfly match! She thrives in crowds and loves bringing people together. Her charismatic personality and zest for life make every day feel like a celebration.
results.visualDescription: A vibrant yeti with glamorous white fur styled perfectly. Wears a sparkly party dress, fun accessories, and has festive decorations in her fur. She has dazzling blue eyes, excited expression, and raises a party popper. Background: rooftop party with city lights and dancing crowd.

results.description: Calvin is your comfort-loving companion! He cherishes quiet nights in and creates the coziest atmosphere. His relaxed nature and appreciation for simple pleasures make home feel like paradise.
results.visualDescription: A plump, cuddly yeti with super soft white fur. Wears comfy pajamas, fuzzy slippers, and a warm robe. He has sleepy brown eyes, content smile, and holds hot cocoa with marshmallows. Background: cozy living room with fireplace, blankets, and favorite movies ready.

results.description: Sarah is your perfect stay-at-home match! She finds joy in creating a warm, inviting space and treasures relaxation. Her nurturing presence and love of coziness make every moment feel like a hug.
results.visualDescription: A soft, cuddly yeti with incredibly fluffy white fur. Wears an oversized sweater, warm socks, and has a blanket draped over shoulders. She has gentle blue eyes, peaceful expression, and sits with a book and candles. Background: hygge-style home with plants, soft lighting, and comfort everywhere.
